description: Stream data from stdin, compress into a Zip container, and either stream to stdout, or

global_flags.description: Compress using method 'M'. Valid methods are store Store without compression deflate Use Deflate compression [Deflault] bzip2 Use Bzip2 compression lzma Use LZMA compression [needs IO::Compress::Lzma] xz Use LZMA compression [needs IO::Compress::Xz] zstd Use LZMA compression [needs IO::Compress::Zstd]
Force a streamed zip file when 'zipfile' option is also enabled. Only applies when 'zipfile' option is used. [Default: No] Stream is always enabled when writing to stdout.
Create a Zip64-compliant zip file [Default: No] Enable Zip64 if input is greater than 4Gig.
Write zip container to the filename 'F' Outputs to stdout if zipfile not specified.
